    • createPublicMethodAccessor

      public static <ACCESSOR> ACCESSOR createPublicMethodAccessor(Class<ACCESSOR> accessor, Class<?> targetClass, String methodName)
      Parameters:
      accessor - FunctionalInterface where the first parameter is the targetObject followed by the parameters for the target method

      public static List<Method> getAllGetters(Class<?> clazz)

    • getInterfaceMethods

      public static List<Method> getInterfaceMethods(Method method)
      Returns:
      a list of all methods declared on super type interfaces this method implements/overrides
